scenario_text.value: How’s it going, Labramon? You find any clues?

Can’t you track them by their scent, like
a police dog?

I’m not sure what a “please dog” is, but I
can’t track humans whose scent I don’t know.

But if you knew their scents you could track
them, right? You’re so dependable, Labramon.
Mm-hmm! You know you can count on me!

(Aoi’s just treating Labramon like a dog now.
Is...is that okay?)

Anyway, there’s nothing around here. We
should try somewhere else!
